      SELECT ename, empno, job
  FROM emp
  WHERE job = (SELECT job
               FROM emp
               WHERE ename = 'SMITH');

      SELECT e2.ename, e2.job
  FROM emp e1, emp e2
  WHERE e1.ename = 'SMITH'
  and e1.job = e2.job;

      SELECT empno, ename, sal, deptno
  FROM emp
  WHERE (deptno, sal)
      IN (SELECT deptno, MAX(sql)
          FROM emp
          GROUP BY deptno);

      SELECT empno, ename, sal, job
  FROM emp
  WHERE deptno != 30
  and sal > ANY (SELECT sal
                 FROM emp
                 WHERE deptno = 30);

      SELECT empno, ename, sal, comm
  FROM emp
  WHERE (sal, NVL(comm, -1))
      IN (SELECT sal, NVL(comm, -1)
          FROM emp
          WHERE deptno = 30);

  • ex2) ì—…ë¬´ë³„ë¡œ ìµœì†Œ ê¸‰ì—¬ë¥¼ ë°›ëŠ” ì‚¬ì›ì˜ ì‚¬ì› ë²ˆí˜¸, ì´ë¦„, ì—…ë¬´, ë¶€ì„œ ë²ˆí˜¸ ì¶œë ¥ 
      SELECT empno, ename, job, deptno
  FROM emp
  WHERE (job, sal)
      IN (SELECT job, MIN(sal)
          FROM emp
          GROUP BY job);
